layer.name: Discipline
layer.definition: Do what needs doing, especially when you don't feel like it.

questions.principle: Schedule it or it won't happen

answers.4: mostly kept, with occasional missed sessions
answers.5: on the calendar — I show up whether I feel like it or not
answers.2: attempted many times, but I can't stick with any of them
answers.3: in bursts — consistent for a while, then completely off
answers.1: nonexistent — I move when I have to and otherwise don't

questions.text: When I don't feel motivated to work out, I ...
questions.principle: Action creates motivation; do it anyway

answers.4: usually do it, though occasionally I negotiate down
answers.2: skip it and plan to make up for it later
answers.1: skip it — I need to feel like it before I'll do it

answers.4: usually built in, though I occasionally get trapped at my desk
answers.5: automatic — I have triggers and habits that keep me moving
answers.2: something I think about but don't actually do
answers.3: inconsistent — I often forget for long stretches
answers.1: rare — I sit for hours and only realize it when something hurts

questions.principle: Voluntary exposure to challenge makes you stronger

answers.4: usually progressing, though sometimes I plateau
answers.5: deliberately progressive — I track, measure, and increase
answers.2: the same routine at the same level for years
answers.3: occasionally pushed, but often I coast
answers.1: comfortable — I stay well within what's easy

questions.text: When my routine is disrupted, my exercise is ...

answers.5: unchanged — I have backup plans and minimal options
answers.2: attempted but usually fails within days
answers.1: gone — I'll restart when things settle

remediation.advice: Don't start with an ambitious program you'll quit. Start with something so small it's embarrassing: 5 pushups. 10-minute walk. The goal is building the discipline, not the fitness - fitness comes later. Brian Tracy: 'The first hour is the rudder of the day.' If morning exercise doesn't work, find a time that does and protect it.

scripture.text: Do you not know that in a race all the runners run, but only one receives the prize? So run that you may obtain it.
